criteria:
The article must satisfy all of the following criteria:
- Personal Experience: It is a first-hand account from a developer or team (e.g., 'This team found,' 'I have been using,' 'I built').
- Rarely Writing Manual Code: The article states or strongly implies that AI coding agents are now so accurate that the human rarely performs manual implementation anymore.
- Clear Productivity Gains: The developer describes in quantitative terms materially faster delivery, higher throughput, or meaningful time savings due to AI assistance.
